module.title: Resource: Forms
module.log: Add role type to form mail model.
Add form transfer targets and rules.
Add first report job about failed transfers.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>forms`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>forms` ( `formId` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `managerMailId` int(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `customerMailId` int(10) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `type` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `receivers` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `forwardOnSuccess` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `type` (`type`), KEY `managerMailId` (`managerMailId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_blocks`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_blocks` ( `blockId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `identifier` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`blockId`), UNIQUE KEY `title` (`title`), UNIQUE KEY `identifier` (`identifier`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_fills`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_fills` ( `fillId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `data` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `referer` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `agent` mediumtext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`fillId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_fill_transfers`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_fill_transfers` ( `formFillTransferId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formTransferRuleId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formTransferTargetId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `fillId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `data` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `message` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, `trace` TEXT COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formFillTransferId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`), KEY `formTransferRuleId` (`formTransferRuleId`), KEY `formTransferTargetId` (`formTransferTargetId`), KEY `fillId` (`fillId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_import_rules`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_import_rules` ( `formImportRuleId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `importConnectionId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:new, 1:test, 2:active, 3:paused, 4:disabled', `title` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `searchCriteria` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `options` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `rules` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `renameTo` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `moveTo` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formImportRuleId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `importConnectionId` (`importConnectionId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_mails`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_mails` ( `mailId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `roleType` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0', `identifier` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `format` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL COMMENT '1-Text, 2-HTML', `subject` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `title` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `content` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mailId`), UNIQUE KEY `identifier` (`identifier`), KEY `format` (`format`), KEY `roleType` (`roleType`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_rules`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_rules` ( `formRuleId` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `formId` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `rules` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `mailAddresses` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `mailId` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formRuleId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`), KEY `type` (`type`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_targets`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_targets` ( `formTransferTargetId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:disabled, 1:enabled', `title` varchar(63) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `className` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `baseUrl` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `apiKey` varchar(63) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formTransferTargetId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `className` (`className`), KEY `createdAt` (`createdAt`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_rules`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_rules` ( `formTransferRuleId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `formTransferTargetId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `title` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `rules` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formTransferRuleId`), KEY `formTransferTargetId` (`formTransferTargetId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>form_rules` ADD `type` TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `formId`, ADD INDEX (`type`);

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_targets`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_targets` ( `formTransferTargetId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `status` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:disabled, 1:enabled', `title` varchar(63) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `className` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `baseUrl` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `apiKey` varchar(63) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formTransferTargetId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `className` (`className`), KEY `createdAt` (`createdAt`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_rules`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_transfer_rules` ( `formTransferRuleId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `formTransferTargetId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `title` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `rules` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formTransferRuleId`), KEY `formTransferTargetId` (`formTransferTargetId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_fill_transfers`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_fill_transfers` ( `formFillTransferId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formTransferRuleId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formTransferTargetId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `fillId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `data` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `message` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, `trace` TEXT COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formFillTransferId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`), KEY `formTransferRuleId` (`formTransferRuleId`), KEY `formTransferTargetId` (`formTransferTargetId`), KEY `fillId` (`fillId`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_import_rules`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>form_import_rules` ( `formImportRuleId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `importConnectionId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `formId` int(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:new, 1:test, 2:active, 3:paused, 4:disabled', `title` varchar(127) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `searchCriteria` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `options` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `rules` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `renameTo` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `moveTo` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `modifiedAt` decimal(12,0) UNSIGNED DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`formImportRuleId`), KEY `formId` (`formId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `importConnectionId` (`importConnectionId`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>form_rules` ADD `filePath` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `mailId`;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>forms` ADD `forwardOnSuccess` VARCHAR(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `receivers`;
